item.title: ChampionX Corp 10-K
item.description: ChampionX Corp, which is in the Construction, Mining & Materials Handling Machinery & Equip [3530] industry, SEC 10-K filing on February 02, 2023 had 26235 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: 2022 - 262 instances million - 215 instances financial - 196 instances cash - 185 instances december - 181 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
